description.attr1: Removes the visual representation of a marker which indicates the ability to enter into 'Overworld' mode.
Overworld mode creates a 3D projection into a Stub's visual systems and alters the state of consciousness far beyond what would be considered normal for a human.
The hack is so simple, that many programmers kick themselves for not thinking of it first and missing out on loads of money. Apparently it's fairly popular with Stubs wishing to be 'more' normal.
